note: This data is expressed in constant 2021 US$.
title: Gross overseas development assistance (ODA) from all donors for scholarships
subtitle: Scholarships are defined as financial aid awards for individuals towards systematic instruction in private or public institutions of higher education to follow full-time studies or training courses in the donor country. This data is expressed in US dollars. It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in the cost of living between countries.
sourceDesc: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
